title: Bug 11280[View Mgmt] Switching perspectives loses view maximized state
OB: When switching perspectives in the software, the CVS repository view is no longer maximized.
EB: The CVS repository view, which is maximized, should remain maximized when switching perspectives.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the software
2. Maximize the CVS repository view
3. Switch to another perspective
4. Observe that the CVS repository view is no longer maximized
